ComicInfo.Title: Blind Justice!
ComicInfo.Summary: Blind Justice!: With Spider-Man missing, Daredevil and Black Widow continue to try and gather evidence to free a boy who has been falsely accused of murder. Spider-Man returns from the Secret Wars in his new black costume and immediately joins their cause. The real murderer is caught but Spider-Man is hard on Daredevil who had to make a deal with the Kingpin to flush the killer out.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:43:38. [Issue ID 38681]
